title: "Hemiergis decresiensis"
output: html_document
---

Common name: Three-toed earless skink.  
*Hemiergis decresiensis* is a burrowing lizard that live in southern Australia.  
Their limbs are very small and each limb has only three toes. This species is viviparous and give birth to live youngs.
